name: NotificationMaker
0:
”Alexa, open notification maker”
”Alexa, tell notification maker occasion”
”Alexa, ask notification maker to send sport notification”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: notification maker
des:
Notification Maker is a development tool that allows developers to create notifications in real-time, and trigger the sending of SetIndicator directives to all Alexa-enabled devices connected to the associated Amazon account. When you ask Notification Maker to create a notification, a randomly selected notification type is added to your notifications queue, and results in your device receiving a directive with instructions to persistently inform the user that a notification is available to be retrieved.

To get started, simply say:
"Alexa, open Notification Maker."
"Alexa, ask Notification Maker to send a weather notification."
Or very short:
"Alexa, ask Notification Maker media."

To retrieve your notifications, say:

"Alexa, what are my notifications?"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
